As the first Product Manager in our Mexico office, you will have the unique opportunity to guide the product vision and own the execution of that vision for two key parts of our business: our shipper experience and the tools that our internal teams use to accelerate our growth. You'll have a direct impact on the bottom line for rapidly scaling startups solving real problems. Nuvocargo isn‚Äôt just about moving cargo. This is about empowering millions of people by changing the way they work and impacting a multi-trillion dollar industry.

You'll work with the Head of Product as well as key internal and external stakeholders to figure out what matters the most to our users, prioritize product problems and articulate trade-offs, brainstorm and design solutions, drive execution, and learn continuously from our users. You'll collaborate with our world-class team of logistics experts, engineers, designers, and marketers to shape the direction of our shipper offering and internal tools, in an industry where the average customer NPS is negative or very low, and where most internal processes do not rely on modern software tools to unlock revenue growth and a superior customer experience.

  • A unique & fun culture at the intersection of Latin America and Silicon Valley
  • Competitive salary and stock options
  • The opportunity to shape the technological foundations of a venture-backed company
  • A chance to join the ground floor of a well-funded, fast-growing startup that is modernizing an industry critical to the global economy.
